Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 73rd overall pick, by Tampa Bay in 2009...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Arizona on 4/23/2011 (Going to ARI: RF N. Markakis, 1B M. Gamel, RF A. Pollock. Going to TB: P J. Vazquez, P M. Smith)...
Injured on 4/23/2011 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2-3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 7/19/2012, off Max Scherzer (TB)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Tampa Bay on 7/19/2012...
Hit first career homerun on 8/2/2012, off Rex Brothers (SF)...
Traded from Arizona to Milwaukee on 7/31/2014 (Going to MIL: CF A. Pollock. Going to ARI: P L. Rojas)...
Injured on 8/13/2016 with a Fractured Ankle, out for 2 weeks...
Traded from Milwaukee to Seattle on 7/31/2017 (Going to MIL: P T. Johnson. Going to SEA: CF A. Pollock)...
